name: nuiFrameworks
tagline: Rebuilding CCV for WxWidgets and Modular architecture based on Movid.
body:
We are working hard to develop CCV's 2.0 version. CCV2.0 will bases on Movid/openCV, and use wxWidgets as its GUI library. Also we will abstract a framework with module structure, we named it nuiFrameworks. nuiFrameworks will provide a general frameworks for all CCx Applications.

Originally hosted [here]()
*** GSoC 2011 project
[![GSoC 2011](http://db.tt/JHJQ8Itn)](http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2011)
**Student:** Seth Sandler
**Mentor:** Christian Moore
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
